casebody.data:
The PEOPLE etc. BY Eric T. SCHNEIDERMAN, etc., Respondent,
v.
CREDIT SUISSE SECURITIES (USA) LLC, etc., et al., Appellants. 2018-218 Court of Appeals of New York. March 22, 2018

Motion by Jonathan Lippman, et al. for leave to file a brief amici curiae on the appeal herein granted and the proposed brief is accepted as filed. Two copies of the brief must be served, an original and nine *709copies filed, and the brief submitted in digital format within seven days.

Judges Garcia and Wilson took no part.
